problem.markdown:
1. Tchebichev lambda mechanism satisfies Grashof rule. This statement is
() Sometime True (x) True () False
2. The link in a four bar mechanism is ?
() None of these (x) Binary link () Flexible link () Ternary link
3. Which of these gives a perfect straight line motion?
() Modified Scott Russel Mechanism (x) Hart's Inversor () Watt's straight line linkage () None of these
4. Which of the following is a simple four bar chain?
(x) Tchebichev Mechanism () Hart's Inversor () Peaucellier Mechanism () None of these
5. Watts indicator is an inversion of
() Slider crank mechanism (x) Four bar mechanism () Double slider crank mechanism () Six bar mechanism
